Posts.Content: May 27, 2016 02:49PM mkblaylock wrote: I made a promise on my birthday list that I would walk every day. My birthday was Monday so not to bad. I am also trying a yoga class tonight to see if I can stretch out my muscles. If it works I will join a class. My goal is to lose the 100 pounds I have gained during this process and get really healthy. I'm using My Fitness Pal as a tracker.
Posts.Title: Kicking LE's butt!! Exercise & Self Care Log Tina337 Flynn
